_meanings:
{@--2@} To
reach, go or come to, arrive at,
attain to; {#sarvamAnaMtyamaSnute#} <ls>Y. 1. 260.</ls>

{@--4@} To
become master of; to master, to
be able (<ab>Ved.</ab>).

{@--5@} To heap, 
accumulate. WITH {#anu#} {1} to reach, come
up to. {2} to equal.

{1} to reach
to. {2} to obtain, get. {3} to addict
oneself to.

{1} to reach to the
top of. {2} to reach, obtain, get.
{3} to be master of.

{1} to
obtain, enjoy, acquire; {#na ca#} 
{#lokAnupASnute#} <ls>Mb.</ls>; {#kriyAPalamupASnute#} <ls>Ms. 6. 82</ls>,
<ls n="Ms.">12. 20</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 12.">81.</ls> {2} to become master
of.

to reach, attain; fill
competely, pervade.

To feed, give to eat, cause
to eat or drink (with <ab>acc.</ab> of 
person); {#ASayaccAmftaM devAn#} <ls>Sk.</ls>;  
<ls>Ms. 3. 83</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 3.">94</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 3.">219</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 3.">220</ls>; (for derivatives
from the causal see under {#A#}).
--WITH {#ati#} to precede or surpass
in eating.
